item.title: Epicscape 614/657
item.dc:creator: @colten804 colten804
item.description:
@colten804 wrote:

Our current project will be a 614 (Dem. base) loading 657 items, animations, NPCs, GFXs, textures, Maps and Objects.

Currently done (some came with base):

  • Prayer training;
  • Fullscreen or fixed dialogues;
  • Hill giants to train on;
  • Full poisoning system;
  • Combat experience per hit;
  • Bone Burying/Prayer Training
  • Full Quick Chat System
  • Yaks to train your combat skills;
  • General Graardor - Finished, see below.
  • Bank tabs + searching;
  • Almost 100% jungle strykewyrm, see below;
  • New RuneScape things like items etc.

  • GrimSpike throws axes, protect from ranging keeps his damage away;
  • SteelWill casts magic attacks, which can be blocked by protect from magic;
  • StrongStack comes after the player and uses melee to fight - protect melee keeps his damage away;
  • All minions have correct max hits;
  • SteelWill and GrimSpike will stay in place, they won’t walk;
  • Graardor has ALL drops 100%. Drop rates are very accurate to RS;
  • Graardor uses 2 attack styles, mostly melee, but at a chance of 15% he does a magic attack with a max hit of 355;
  • Minions respawn directly unless Graardor has been killed;
  • When the player leaves the chamber, the minions & Graardor stop attacking and walk back to their original place.

  • Slayer requirement works;
  • Stomp on the floor to make him appear;
  • All animations are correct;
  • Protect melee blocks his hits;
  • When respawning, the mount respawns;
  • Poisonable, also through prayer;
  • When out of range, disappear;
  • When not close enough for melee, do ranged.

Images of fight
[b]Stomp on the floor to make it appear.

The strykewyrm pops out of the ground.

It directly starts attacking the player.

You can only hit him when your slayer level is high enough.

Protect melee blocks his hits completely.

When faint, he sinks back in the soil.

After one minute, the mount respawns.
[/b]

I just started as I said, but I need some feedback to keep myself going, otherwise I get bored.


Some of our newest Items!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uUV8aKJ6ApQ






Please post any ideas (or a banner ) you have.

Read full topic
